capture().description: Captures an image and returns it to a device over Bluetooth.

overlay(enable).description: Draws a single pixel of color color at the position x, y.

output(x,y,format).description: Set the output resolution and format. x and y represent the output resolution in pixels. format can be either RGB, 'YUV' or 'JPEG'. The default output settings are camera.output(640, 400, 'YUV').

zoom(multiplier).description: Sets the zoom level of the camera. Multiplier can be any floating point number between 1 and 8.
